Payment - Class in Restaurant
An instance of this class represents a payment for orders of table(s)
Payment() - Constructor for class Restaurant.Payment
Constructor instantiates a new ArrayList of tables, sets subtotal to zero and paymentComplete to false

Indicator for whether the payment is complete

Prints the following details of the payment: Date and time, Name and address of restaurant, Table number(s), Order ID(s), Staff ID, Details (quantity, name and price) of order items, Sub-total, Taxes, Discounts and Total price.
